body:
Hi,


> We still have room for one or two additional presentations, if someone
> cares to submit an abstract.  Tentative titles are posted for speakers,
> with more details to follow.


would anybody interested in a workshop or talk about installing Radiance
on Debian, or deploying Debian together with radiance using FAI (the
fully automatic installer) or similar things?


Cheers,


Bernd
